DescribeAppDimensionMetrics.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: rum.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeAppDimensionMetrics
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Filter": "'[]'",
    "ProjectID": 1,
    "FilterSimple": "'{\\\"entrance_time__gte\\\":1671367462000,\\\"entrance_time__lte\\\":1671453862000,\\\"category__in\\\":[\\\"PERF_NET_REQUEST\\\"],\\\"d4\\\":\\\"false\\\",\\\"d3\\\":\\\"http\\\",\\\"v1__lte\\\":300000}'",
    "From": "'kv_7_dist'",
    "Fields": "'[[\\\"explodeDimensions\\\",\\\"d2\\\",\\\"d8\\\"],[\\\"as\\\",[\\\"multiIf\\\",[\\\"equals\\\",\\\"dimension_name\\\",\\\"'d2'\\\"],\\\"'domain'\\\",[\\\"equals\\\",\\\"dimension_name\\\",\\\"'d8'\\\"],\\\"'region'\\\",\\\"dimension_name\\\"],\\\"dimension\\\"],[\\\"as\\\",[\\\"avg\\\",\\\"v1\\\"],\\\"cost_time\\\"],[\\\"as\\\",[\\\"count\\\",1],\\\"request_cnt\\\"],[\\\"as\\\",[\\\"aggByPartition\\\",\\\"sum\\\",\\\"request_cnt\\\",\\\"dimension_name\\\"],\\\"total_request_cnt\\\"],[\\\"as\\\",\\\"total_request_cnt\\\",\\\"total_cnt\\\"],[\\\"as\\\",\\\"request_cnt\\\",\\\"cnt\\\"],[\\\"as\\\",[\\\"aggByPartition\\\",\\\"row_number\\\",\\\"none\\\",\\\"dimension_name\\\",[\\\"order_by\\\",\\\"request_cnt\\\",\\\"desc\\\"]],\\\"rank_cnt\\\"]]'",
    "Limit": 1000
}
DescribeAppDimensionMetrics.title: 查询多维分析数据

DescribeAppMetricsData.title: 查询 app 指标数据

DescribeAppSingleCaseDetailList.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: rum.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeAppSingleCaseDetailList
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Filter": "{\"category__in\":[\"PERF_CRASH\"]}",
    "ProjectID": 1,
    "FilterSimple": "{\"entrance_time__gte\":1671025353000,\"entrance_time__lte\":1671284553000,\"feature_md5\":\"8aba3b8538d7d843c558012c11219e1d\",\"category__in\":[\"PERF_CRASH\"]}",
    "From": "db.name",
    "Fields": "[[\"as\",\"device_id\",\"device_id\"],\"entrance_time\",[\"as\",\"feature_md5\",\"feature_md5\"],[\"as\",\"version\",\"version\"],[\"as\",\"id\",\"id\"],[\"as\",\"user_id\",\"user_id\"]]",
    "Limit": 200,
    "OrderBy": [
        "entrance_time desc"
    ]
}
DescribeAppSingleCaseDetailList.title: 查询 app 监控个例详情列表

DescribeAppSingleCaseList.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: rum.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeAppSingleCaseList
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Filter": "{\"app_id\": 1}",
    "ProjectID": 1,
    "FilterSimple": "{\"entrance_time__gte\":1671370185000,\"entrance_time__lte\":1671456585000,\"category__in\":[\"PERF_CRASH\"]}",
    "From": "'singleton_v2_dist'",
    "Fields": "[\"app_id\",[\"as\",[\"any\",[\"cast\",\"feature\",\"'String'\"]],\"row_feature\"],[\"as\",[\"max\",\"entrance_time\"],\"last_entrance_time\"],\"feature_md5\",[\"as\",[\"uniq\",\"device_id\"],\"crash_user_cnt\"],[\"as\",[\"count\",1],\"crash_cnt\"],[\"as\",[\"aggByPartition\",\"sum\",\"crash_user_cnt\",\"app_id\"],\"total_crash_user_cnt\"],[\"as\",[\"aggByPartition\",\"sum\",\"crash_cnt\",\"app_id\"],\"total_crash_cnt\"]]",
    "GroupBy": [
        "feature_md5",
        "app_id",
        "platform"
    ],
    "OrderBy": [
        "crash_cnt desc"
    ]
}
DescribeAppSingleCaseList.title: 查询 app 个例聚合列表
